pr_title: Resolve discovery URIs and open the tab accordingly

timeline.message:
Resolve discovery URIs and open the tab accordingly

- LEARNER-7596
This commit contains 2 major things:
1 - URI for `Explore New Programs` is now properly resolved and
clicking on it leads to the specific Programs tab within the
Discovery tab.
2 - Clicking on `Find a Course` now leads to the Discovery tab
and selects the inner Course tab as well.
